msg: Merge birt branch 831204:886087 and 831209:885099. A contribution by Antwebsystems employee Chattree

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1356: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1356. Nodes may be pinned down by the map used by compareDocumentPosition() which would be otherwise garbage collectible. Now storing the nodes in a WeakHashMap to eliminate this memory leak. Patch thanks to Ludger Bünger.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1356: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1356. Nodes may be pinned down by the map used by compareDocumentPosition() which would be otherwise garbage collectible. Now storing the nodes in a WeakHashMap to eliminate this memory leak. Patch thanks to Ludger Bünger.
